name: Dark Secrets Demo
description:
The game is about a girl that lives in a laboratory and one day all the scientists were gone because the experiments were able to get out of their rooms.

Your goal is to escape the laboratory, but many things will happen as you go and many secrets will be discovered.

!!!WARNING!!!

There's blood in the game, so if you don't like it, I don't recommend playing it.

Everything you see in the demo has a chance to change.

If you find any bugs, please, tell me so I can fix them.

I'm accepting tips on how to improve my game :)
